reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress to be of great quality, with a soft velvet fabric that runs true to size.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress!
items.body: Purchased for fall family photos and it was perfect! The details on the dress really give it that extra pop. The materail was soft and stretchy. Would be flattering for many body types as it is not tight in the arms, chest, or belly. Would also be great for maternity photos. Read more
items.author: Katie Hershberger

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks better on, than on the hanger!!
items.body: If you have a medium to large bust like me, you will likely feel like this dress is incredibly flattering. This accentuates my waist while showing off my chest, but not in the wrong kind of way. The patterned velvet material is gorgeous and flatters even the less than flattering parts of my body. It’s got some stretch, and if you want it to look loose and flowy, order one size up for sure. That being said, I’m 5’3” and about 165#, with some extra weight hanging on around my belly and hips- I’m a 36DD. The medium fits beautifully, but again, if I wanted it to be super loose looking as it appears on the model, I’d go with the large. The material is a nice thick velvet without being overly heavy. I’d honestly give this one more stars if I were able- well worth the money! I plan to wear it to a fall wedding with a nice wrap and beaded shoes, but it could be dressed down with boots and a cute jacket, too. Read more
items.author: D Jones

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely dress
items.body: Bought for my granddaughter’s Fall Wedding Reception. It was perfect in color, texture and size. Lots of compliments when I wear it. Read more
items.author: A Purposeful Walk

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but seems short
items.body: This dress seems a little short. I am not tall and it feels short on me. The color (and material) is beautiful, much more bright and rich than the stock picture shows. Just wish it were longer. It is a tiny bit lower cut than I'd prefer. Probably not a problem for most though. Read more
items.author: Cory Thompson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, excellent quality and wrinkle free!
items.body: I was pleasantly surprised by the exceptional quality of this dress in person. It gives a lovely boho vibe that can effortlessly transition from casual to dressy. The burnt orange color matches the image perfectly, and the velvet fabric is soft with just the right thickness—light enough to wear comfortably without feeling overheated. It washes and dries with ease, requiring no ironing. Even after being loosely packed in my suitcase, it emerged ready to wear, completely wrinkle-free! I’m 5'4" and 140 lbs; Amazon suggested a large, but I opted for a medium, and it fit perfectly while still offering some stretch in the waistband. The only drawback is that I wish it were about 2 inches longer, as I prefer it to extend a bit past my ankles. Overall, excellent purchase for the price! Read more
items.author: Chris Peterson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size, comfortable, cute
items.body: Loved the color and fit. Read more
items.author: kelly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and pretty postpartum
items.body: Very soft, pretty and comfortable. I originally bought this dress with the hope of breastfeeding but the buttons are just for show, which is fine - I was able to very easily pump with my travel set that sit right in my bra cups and give the pumped milk to baby. This dress helped with postpartum mama feel pretty this holiday. Read more
items.author: Melanie M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: The material is very soft and the dress is very well made and flattering. Read more
items.author: Leticia

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal V Neck Short Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal V Neck Short Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A-emerald Green, A-burgundy Red Orange, A-deep Blue, B-teal Blue, B-wine Red, A-black, A-burnt Orange, A-lake Blue, B-earthly Orange. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
